column2: Since your liege is underage and lacking a guardian, you may decide to take your liege as your ward.
My liege, [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], is underage and lacking a guardian. As regent, I should take [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] under my wing.
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], I have decided that your interests are best served by my seeing to your education\nYour Regent,\n[From.GetBestName]
